skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle1Text: Commander, don't you think we should plant some flowers?
skins.secIdle2Text: Since you're ignoring me, I might as well... *yawns*... get some sleep.
skins.secIdle3Text: Yes? This is what I look like when I'm happy.
skins.secIdle4Text: I'm not trying to make you pay attention to me. Nope, not at all...
skins.secIdle5Text: I'm not trying to get you to play with me. Nope, probably not...

skins.name: Retrofit
skins.secIdle1Text: I’m not making a pose to win praise from my Commander, emm, of course not.
skins.secIdle2Text: But keeping this pose is... so tiresome... Commander, your lap, I want to take a nap on it Zzzzzz
skins.secIdle3Text: Everyone has been saying that I look more handsome now, but my essence remains unchanged, is that a compliment?
skins.secTouchText: Emm... umm... uh-oh, I fell asleep while standing.

skins.name: White Rabbit's Oath
skins.secIdle1Text: Mm... Laffey is getting sleepy. Commander's lap feels nice, so I'll sleep here...
skins.secIdle2Text: Laffey gets a disease that makes her fall asleep when she's not with Commander. I'm not lying, it's true...
skins.secIdle3Text: Even if Commander is staring at another girl, Laffey won't get upset at all. Mm, I really won't. Get. Upset. At. All.
skins.secIdle4Text: Commander, if you pamper Laffey so much, she will turn into a Yayanami.
skins.secIdle5Text: No matter how tough things get, Laffey will always return to Commander's side... Because we made a vow...
skins.secTouchText: Commander, did you also contract the disease that makes you fall asleep if you leave Laffey's side?
skins.secSpecialTouchText: Laffey... has almost gotten used to Commander's lechery...
skins.secHeadPatText: Commander, do you like Laffey's bunny ears?

skins.name: Snow Rabbit and Candy Apple
skins.secIdle1Text: Want a candied apple, Commander? I got it from Ayanami. Here.
skins.secIdle2Text: I hope... I'll have lots of good naps... this whole year.
skins.secIdle3Text: Commander, my friends are calling for me... so I'm gonna go play with them.

skins.name: White Rabbit Welcomes the Spring
skins.secIdle1Text: I'm wearing limited-edition Lunar New Year bunny ears and bunny slippers... do you like them? I like them.
skins.secIdle2Text: I think Zed is interested in old Lunar New Year folklore...
skins.secIdle3Text: Sitting on top of this tree makes me feel like I'm going to blossom, too...
skins.secTouchText: I totally don't feel like leaning against your shoulder, Commander. Nope, not at all...
skins.secSpecialTouchText: Commander, are you having weird thoughts again...?

skins.name: Bunny Idol @Unmotivated
skins.secIdle1Text: All these lessons and rehearsals... What a pain... Can I just put on a show where I sleep while standing up?
skins.secIdle2Text: Even though Benson said that Laffey would do the entire Planet Bunny proud by becoming an idol, it honestly sounds like a pain in the bun. However, the outfit she made for me is really cute... so maybe I can put in some effort for her sake.
skins.secIdle3Text: I'm done with today's lessons... they were unexpectedly fun.
skins.secIdle4Text: ...I think I got some fanmail? Mm, it makes me a little happy..
skins.secTouchText: Commander, Laffey seems to be getting better at singing, because I can stand still now...
